verses.text:
Go thou and do the work awaiting thee to-day,
And think not of the morrow's care and sorrow;
Go thou and do the best that thou canst do to-day,
And leave the rest to God.

Do thou thy part, and He will do His part for thee,
And daily unto thee fresh strength be given;
Thy loving work will be rewarded faithfully,
And leave the rest to God.

Thy service shall be of the clearest, purest kind,
Of this be constantly and thankfully mindful;
Thy spirit shall be kept in perfect peace and joy,
And leave the rest to God.

The way, the truth, the life, will all be made so clear,
And there shall be no doubting, no perplexing;
Thy mind shall be enlightened, and thy heart made pure,
And leave the rest to God.

chorus.text:
Leave the rest to God, leave the rest to God,
And He will work out all thy heart's desire;
Leave the rest to God, leave the rest to God,
And He will bring the answer by and by.
